features: Unlimited access to gym facilities.

Predictable monthly payments.
Free access to locker rooms and showers.
Discounts on partner wellness products.

No long-term commitment required.
Access to all equipment during the session.
Perfect for trying out the gym or specific classes.
Option to upgrade to a plan after a trial period.
Combines gym access, fitness classes, and personal training sessions.
Encourages members to use multiple services at a reduced cost.
Includes free nutritional consultation.
Priority booking for popular classes and trainers.
Access to exclusive workshops or events.
Lower rates during off-peak hours (e.g., mornings, afternoons).
Higher rates during peak times to manage demand.
Encourages usage during quieter hours for better availability of equipment.
Real-time pricing updates through the gym app or website.
Special discounts for students or seniors during off-peak hours.

Premium tier includes advanced classes, spa access, and personal training sessions.
Customizable tiers based on individual needs (e.g., yoga-only or weightlifting-only).
Option to upgrade or downgrade tiers anytime without penalties.
Priority customer support for higher-tier members.
Shared memberships for families or groups of friends (2–5 people).
Group discounts on personal training sessions or classes.
Encourages community and group motivation for fitness goals.
Access to family-friendly facilities like kids’ play areas (where available).
Flexible transfer of unused sessions between family members.
Discounted memberships negotiated with companies for employees’ wellness programs.
Custom fitness challenges and events tailored for corporate teams.
Access to mental health resources like meditation sessions or counseling services.
'Wellness Days' with free workshops on fitness and nutrition for employees.
'Work-from-gym' options with co-working spaces in select locations.
Ideal for personal training or specialty programs like boxing, Pilates, etc.
'Pay-per-session' flexibility without the need for long-term commitment.
'Trainer Match' feature to find the best trainer based on your goals and preferences.
'Skill Progression Tracking' included with each session via mobile app integration.
'One-time payment' option with significant savings over monthly plans.
'Loyalty Rewards Program' offering perks like free merchandise or additional sessions after renewal.
'Freeze Membership' option available for vacations or emergencies (up to 2 months per year).
'Welcome Kit' with gym-branded gear upon sign-up.
'Restricted Access' limited to quieter times like early mornings or afternoons only (no evenings/weekends).
'Budget-Friendly Option' ideal for students, freelancers, or retirees with flexible schedules.
'Off-Peak Discounts' on personal training sessions booked during these hours.
